LanguageData.JAI.Gizmo.Transceiver.Start.Desc: Start transmitting and receiving in manual mode. After completion, the transceiver will switch back to idle mode waiting new command.
LanguageData.JAI.Gizmo.Transceiver.Stop.Desc: Stops the current transceiver cycle. All the progress and energy spent will be lost.
LanguageData.JAI.Gizmo.Transceiver.Stop.Confirm: Really want to stop process? The key, all data and energy will be lost!
LanguageData.JAI.Gizmo.Transceiver.Autostart.Desc: Switches the automatic start of the transceiver cycle when there is a key and a reserve of energy.
LanguageData.JAI.Gizmo.Mute.Desc: Drowns out all the sounds of the {0}.
LanguageData.JAI.Gizmo.Repairer.Title: Repair targets
LanguageData.JAI.Gizmo.Repairer.Title.Desc: HP levels:\n For new jobs: using MIN value - it thing's HP is lesser than MIN, the pawn will repair it.\n For current job - the pawn will repair the thing until MAX value.
